inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: VTEX API KEY
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can get the API KEY from the VTEX admin panel, go to the account settings and then to the API keys section.

inputs.name: apiToken
inputs.label: VTEX API TOKEN
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can get the API TOKEN from the VTEX admin panel, go to the account settings and then to the API keys section.

inputs.name: account
inputs.label: VTEX ACCOUNT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The account name of the VTEX store

inputs.name: forcePublish
inputs.label: Execute the vtex publish command with the --force flag
inputs.helpMarkDown: This flag will force the publish command of vtex with the --force flag.

inputs.name: deploy
inputs.label: Execute the command vtex deploy --force before the vtex publish command
inputs.helpMarkDown: This flag will execute the vtex deploy command with the --force flag before the vtex publish command.

inputs.name: beta
inputs.label: Generate a beta version of the app
inputs.helpMarkDown: This flag will generate a beta version of the app.
